short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows to provide in-app help content for websites and web-based applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can be used by SAP consultants and implementation partners to integrate the SAP Companion in-app help framework into websites and web-based applications to improve the user onboarding, change management and knowledge transfer. 
Once configured, context-sensitive help content (such as on-screen help, step-by-step instructions, related documents and tutorials) is loaded from an external server and displayed directly in the application to support users in their daily work.
